trans-unit.source: An instance of BookmarkReachedEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> event.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av BookmarkReachedEventArgs opprettes når den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>objekt hever den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> event when it encounters a bookmark while processing any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>opphøyer den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>-hendelse når det oppstår et bokmerke under behandling av noen av de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To obtain the name and location of the bookmark that triggered the event, access the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A> and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> properties in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha navnet og plasseringen av bokmerket som utløste hendelsen, få tilgang til den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>Egenskaper i et behandlingsprogram for hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the time offset at which the bookmark was reached.
trans-unit.target: Henter tidsforskyvning i bokmerket er nådd.

trans-unit.source: Returns the location in the audio input stream of a synthesis engine when the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer plasseringen i lyd inndataflyten syntese-motoren når hendelsen ble opp.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the bookmark that was reached.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på bokmerke er nådd.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value for the name of the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi for navnet på bokmerket.
